Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Longport in 1980...
Traded from Longport to Wisconsin on 3/2/1980 (Going to LP: 3B S. Coleman, 2B R. Rochon, CF E. Godines, 1B A. Durso. Going to WIS: CF S. Stumpf, P J. Lavergne)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Dan Coley (PG)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/24/1984, off Lyndon Williamson (NJ)...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1984, hitting .289 with 9 HR, 43 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1985...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1986, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1987...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1989, hitting .407 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1990, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1990, hitting .469 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Manchester on 6/9/1991...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
